name: Data-driven Company
desc: To make data and analytics part of the business strategy, its systems, processes and culture.

name: Imputation of data
desc: Process of replacing missing data with substituted (estimated) values.

name: Resampling
desc: Using random subsets of the data for estimating the precision of sample statistics, exchanging labels on data points, validating models, etc.

name: Data Cleaning
desc: Detecting and correcting corrupt or inaccurate observations from a database and identifying incomplete, incorrect, inaccurate or irrelevant data features or observations and then replacing, modifying, or deleting the dirty data.

name: Outlier Detection
desc: Process of detecting and subsequently excluding outliers from a given set of data, using Numeric outlier, Z-Score, DBSCAN, Isolation Forest, etc.

name: Train, Test, Validation
desc: The three sets the data set is splitted on in order to train, test and validate the model.

name: Model Stability
desc: Stability analysis enables to determine how the input variations are going to impact the output of the model.

name: Parsimonious model
desc: Parsimonious models are simple models with great explanatory and predictive power.
